SEARCH
Package com.financial.multi_year_analysis

Class MultiYearBudgetExpense

java.lang.Object
com.financial.multi_year_analysis.MultiYearBudgetEntry
com.financial.multi_year_analysis.MultiYearBudgetExpense
public class MultiYearBudgetExpense extends MultiYearBudgetEntry
Represents an expense entry in a multi-year budget analysis system. This class extends MultiYearBudgetEntry and supports both simple expenses and entity-specific expenses with regular and public investment breakdowns.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Financial Analysis System

  • Constructor Details

    • MultiYearBudgetExpense

      public MultiYearBudgetExpense(String code, String description, String category, long amount, int year)
      Constructs a simple MultiYearBudgetExpense without entity association. The expense is automatically added to the global expenses collection.
      Parameters:
      code - the unique identifier code for this expense entry
      description - a textual description of the expense
      category - the category this expense belongs to
      amount - the expense amount (in minor currency units, e.g., cents)
      year - the fiscal year this expense applies to

    • MultiYearBudgetExpense

      public MultiYearBudgetExpense(String entityCode, String entityName, long regularAmount, long publicInvestmentAmount, int year)
      Constructs an entity-specific MultiYearBudgetExpense with separate tracking for regular and public investment amounts. The total amount is calculated as the sum of regular and public investment amounts.
      Parameters:
      entityCode - the unique identifier code for the entity incurring this expense
      entityName - the name of the entity
      regularAmount - the regular expense amount (non-investment spending)
      publicInvestmentAmount - the public investment expense amount
      year - the fiscal year this expense applies to

  • Method Details

    • getMultiYearBudgetExpenses

      public static List<MultiYearBudgetExpense> getMultiYearBudgetExpenses()
      Returns the complete list of all multi-year budget expenses.
      Returns:
      a list containing all expense entries created

    • getMultiYearBudgetExpensesOfEntities

      public static List<MultiYearBudgetExpense> getMultiYearBudgetExpensesOfEntities()

    • getMultiYearBudgetExpensesOfSpecificYear

      public static List<MultiYearBudgetExpense> getMultiYearBudgetExpensesOfSpecificYear(int year)
      Retrieves all expense entries for a specific fiscal year.
      Parameters:
      year - the fiscal year to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of expense entries matching the specified year

    • getMultiYearBudgetExpensesOfSpecificCode

      public static List<MultiYearBudgetExpense> getMultiYearBudgetExpensesOfSpecificCode(String code)
      Retrieves all expense entries with a specific code across all years. This is useful for tracking a particular expense type over time.
      Parameters:
      code - the expense code to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of expense entries matching the specified code

    • getMultiYearExpensesOfEntityWithEntityCode

      public static List<MultiYearBudgetExpense> getMultiYearExpensesOfEntityWithEntityCode(String entityCode)
      Retrieves all expense entries associated with a specific entity by filtering the entity-specific expenses collection.
      Parameters:
      entityCode - the entity code to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of expense entries for the specified entity

    • getSumOfSpecificYear

      public static long getSumOfSpecificYear(int year)
      Calculates the total expense amount for a specific fiscal year by summing all expense entries for that year.
      Parameters:
      year - the fiscal year to calculate the total for
      Returns:
      the total expense amount for the specified year

    • getSumOfAllYears

      public static Map<Integer,Long> getSumOfAllYears()
      Calculates the total expense for each year present in the historical data. Returns a map where keys are years and values are the total expense amounts. Years are sorted in ascending order.
      Returns:
      a map of year to total expense amount for all years with data

    • getRegularAmount

      public long getRegularAmount()
      Returns the regular (non-investment) portion of this expense.
      Returns:
      the regular expense amount

      Returns the public investment portion of this expense.
      Returns:
      the public investment expense amount

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Description copied from class: MultiYearBudgetEntry
      Returns a formatted string representation of this budget entry. The amount is formatted with thousand separators for readability.
